actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, S. Rept. 93-282.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: An original joint resolution to express a national policy with respect to the expansion of commerce in goods and services between the United States and nonmarket economy countries.

summary.text: Provides that it is the policy of the United States to encourage and support efforts to expand American trade, undertake cooperative projects and broaden contracts with nonmarket economy countries.

titles.title: An original joint resolution to express a national policy with respect to the expansion of commerce in goods and services between the United States and nonmarket economy countries.
